DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening test may help doctor find cancer cell early plan well treatment breast cancer . It yet know whether positron emission mammography effective standard mammography find breast tumor . PURPOSE : This phase III trial study positron emission mammography see well work compare standard mammography woman dense breast tissue high risk breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Positron Emission Mammography Standard Mammography Women High Risk Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To install breast PET system test ensure compliance regulatory agency include ACR FDA . - To measure compare number call-back positron emission mammography ( PEM ) image conventional mammography , calculate number true positive false positive exam mammograms PEM imagine use pathologic result yearly follow-up mammogram result ( cancer detection rate ) woman dense breast tissue high risk breast cancer . - To measure compare patient satisfaction conventional mammography PEM term comfort pain . - To measure compare cost effectiveness conventional mammography v PEM examine cost , examination time , radiologist reading time . OUTLINE : Patients undergo conventional two-view mammogram positron emission mammography ( PEM ) . Immediately follow treatment , patient complete questionnaire satisfaction standard mammogram PEM . After completion study treatment , patient follow annually .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Scheduled undergo screen mammogram one Boston Medical Centeraffiliated primary care clinic meet 1 follow criterion : Dense breast tissue At highrisk breast cancer PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Has 1 follow racial ethnic background base patient 's country birth mother father 's country birth : Hispanic Haitian Creole African American Caucasian PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : None specify Exclusion criterion : No history breast cancer , palpable breast mass , abnormal nipple discharge , focal complaint warrant diagnostic mammogram
